root: ^Well, you weren't supposed to catch me in the act...

c-0: ^Huh? You don't know what I'm doing?
^I've been secretly planting sunflowers in the farm, even though I'm only supposed to plant wheat.
^I've been able to get away with it so far because this plot's managed by me, and no one comes to check.
^I know we farmers aren't supposed to do this, but I simply love sunflower seeds. So I just had to!
^Please don't tell anyone that I'm doing this! Okay?!
